name: Teach for America
description: Recruits and trains educators to work in low-income communities to improve education access and outcomes.

name: DonorsChoose
description: Connects teachers with donors to fund classroom projects and materials.

name: Boys & Girls Clubs of America
description: Offers youth development programs and activities to empower young people.

name: Khan Academy
description: Provides free educational resources and personalized learning tools.

name: National Education Association (NEA)
description: Advocates for public education and supports educators across the United States.

name: Big Brothers Big Sisters of America
description: Provides mentoring programs for children facing adversity.

name: First Book
description: Provides books and educational resources to children in need.

name: College Board
description: Administers standardized tests and offers resources to help students prepare for college.

name: Junior Achievement USA
description: Empowers young people to succeed in the global economy through experiential learning programs.

name: Girls Who Code
description: Inspires and equips girls with coding skills and STEM education.

name: National 4-H Council
description: Provides hands-on learning experiences for youth in agriculture, STEM, leadership, and more.

name: American Association of University Women (AAUW)
description: Advocates for gender equity and supports women and girls in education and the workplace.

name: National Geographic Society Education
description: Offers educational resources, exploration grants, and experiences for students and educators.

name: PENCIL
description: Connects business professionals with schools to support student success.

name: Save the Children USA
description: Supports children's education, health, and safety worldwide, including the United States.

name: Reading Is Fundamental (RIF)
description: Promotes literacy by providing free books and resources to children and families.

name: National Center for Learning Disabilities (NCLD)
description: Advocates for individuals with learning and attention issues and offers resources for students and families.

name: Public Broadcasting Service (PBS)
description: Provides educational programming and resources for children and adults.

name: America's Promise Alliance
description: Works to ensure all young people have the opportunity for success and well-being.

name: National PTA
description: Supports family engagement in education and advocates for the well-being of all children.
